scripts.test:coverage:solidity: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=local -v IS_TEST_COVERAGE=true -e .env.example turbo run test:coverage:solidity
scripts.contracts:deploy:latest: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=local -v NEXT_DEPLOY_LATEST_ONLY=true -e .env turbo run deploy --filter=@vechain/vebetterdao-contracts
scripts.contracts:deploy:testnet-staging:latest: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=testnet-staging -v NEXT_DEPLOY_LATEST_ONLY=true  -e .env turbo run deploy --filter=@vechain/vebetterdao-contracts
scripts.contracts:select-and-deploy: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=local -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/deploy/select-and-deploy.ts
scripts.contracts:select-and-deploy:testnet-stag: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=testnet-staging -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/deploy/select-and-deploy.ts
scripts.contracts:select-and-deploy:testnet: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=testnet -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/deploy/select-and-deploy.ts
scripts.contracts:select-and-deploy:mainnet: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=mainnet -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/deploy/select-and-deploy.ts
scripts.contracts:upgrade: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=local -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/upgrade/select-and-upgrade.ts
scripts.contracts:upgrade:testnet-staging: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=testnet-staging -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/upgrade/select-and-upgrade.ts
scripts.contracts:upgrade:testnet: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=testnet -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/upgrade/select-and-upgrade.ts
scripts.contracts:upgrade:mainnet: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=mainnet -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/upgrade/select-and-upgrade.ts
scripts.contracts:test:shard: SHARD=$SHARD dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=local -- turbo run test:hardhat:shard --filter=@vechain/vebetterdao-contracts
scripts.contracts:call: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=local -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/functionCalls/select-and-call.ts
scripts.contracts:call:testnet-staging: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=testnet-staging -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/functionCalls/select-and-call.ts
scripts.contracts:call:testnet: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=testnet -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/functionCalls/select-and-call.ts
scripts.contracts:call:mainnet: dotenv -v NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=mainnet -- yarn workspace @vechain/vebetterdao-contracts ts-node scripts/functionCalls/select-and-call.ts
